name: Pro Bus Driver 2
description:
Pro Bus Driver 2 is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a public transport bus. As the driver, you are responsible for picking up passengers from different locations and dropping them off at their final destinations, all while navigating through busy city streets and adhering to strict schedules.

In this game, your mission is to get from the starting station to the final one in a limited amount of time, ensuring that your passengers arrive at their destinations on time. Your passengers may be going to school, work, or other important appointments, and it is your responsibility to get them there safely and on time.

So, if you have what it takes to become a skilled and successful public transport bus driver, download Pro Bus Driver 2 and get ready to take on the challenge!

Game features :
- Multiple levels
- 3 buses
- Limited time
